**Options:**

| Flag | Description |

### `deep-research <query>`

Run deep research

**Options:**

| Flag | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `--gem <name>` | Gem name |
| `--local` | Use local execution |
| `--remote` | Use Windmill remote execution (Default) |
| `--headed` | Show browser |
| `--async` | Start async (returns job ID immediately) |


_Source: [gemini.ts:L164](file:///home/sim/Obsi/Prods/01-pwf/agents/rsrch/src/commands/gemini.ts#L164)_

### `sync-to-remote [profileId]`

Export auth from local browser and sync to remote server

**Options:**

| Flag | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `--remote <host>` | Remote host (e.g., halvarm or user@host) |
| `--cdp-port <port>` | Local CDP port |
| `--remote-path <path>` | Remote profiles path |


_Source: [profile.ts:L51](file:///home/sim/Obsi/Prods/01-pwf/agents/rsrch/src/commands/profile.ts#L51)_

***
### `sync`

Copy browser auth from local Cromite/Chromium to rsrch container

**Options:**

| Flag | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `--source <path>` | Source browser profile path (e.g., ~/.config/chromium/ |
| `--target <name>` | Target: local | halvarm |
| `--list-sources` | List available source profiles |
| `--restart` | Restart target browser after sync |


_Source: [profile.ts:L140](file:///home/sim/Obsi/Prods/01-pwf/agents/rsrch/src/commands/profile.ts#L140)_
